environment_file.description: File (.sh) with list of environment variables to be loaded by each processing node

mpi.description: MPI run can be disabled with `--no-mpi` option

mpioptions.description: Options to be passed to MPI (e.g. `--bind-to {none,hwthread, core, l1cache, l2cache, l3cache, socket, numa, board}`) (default=)

nproc.description: Number of MPI processors per node used (NB: mpi tot nproc=nproc x nnodes)

hostfile.description: Ascii file with list of hosts used by MPI

container_image.description: Singularity container image file (.simg) with CAESAR installed software

container_options.description: Options to be passed to container run (e.g. `-B /home/user:/home/user`)

batch_system.description: Name of batch system. Valid choices are {PBS,SLURM}

batch_queue.description: Name of queue in batch system

job_walltime.description: Job wall time in batch system

job_cpus.description: Number of cpu per node requested for the job

job_nodes.description: Number of nodes requested for the job

job_memory.description: Memory in GB required for the job

job_user_group.description: Name of job user group batch system
